channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress

item.title: CVE-2022-2711|2024-08-03T00:46:03.827Z -- unknown -- import%20any%20xml%20or%20csv%20file%20to%20wordpress
item.description: The Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress plugin before 3.6.9 is not validating the paths of files contained in uploaded zip archives, allowing highly privileged users, such as admins, to write arbitrary files to any part of the file system accessible by the web server via a path traversal vector.

item.title: CVE-2022-3418|2024-08-03T01:07:06.584Z -- unknown -- import%20any%20xml%20or%20csv%20file%20to%20wordpress
item.description: The Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress plugin before 3.6.9 is not properly filtering which file extensions are allowed to be imported on the server, which could allow administrators in multi-site WordPress installations to upload arbitrary files

item.title: CVE-2022-2268|2024-08-03T00:32:09.466Z -- unknown -- import%20any%20xml%20or%20csv%20file%20to%20wordpress
item.description: The Import any XML or CSV File to WordPress plugin before 3.6.8 accepts all zip files and automatically extracts the zip file without validating the extracted file type. Allowing high privilege users such as admin to upload an arbitrary file like PHP, leading to RCE
